All the houses are exterior, with excellent finishes and furnished and semi-equipped kitchens (ceramic hob, oven, extractor hood, sink and tap).    Residencial El Olivar de Torrejón de la Calzada stands out for its excellent location, in a consolidated area with all the services you need at your fingertips: schools, sports areas, supermarkets, restaurants, health center, pharmacies, etc. Located in the heart of the city. Torrejón de la Calzada stands out from the surrounding towns for its excellent communication.    TORREJÓN DE LA CALZADA It is a municipality in the south of the Community of Madrid. It has about 8,900 inhabitants and an area of 8.98 km².    PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION It has 4 interurban bus lines, three of which link this municipality with Madrid, in Plaza Elíptica, specifically. It also has two long-distance lines, one of them with a header at Plaza Elíptica and another at the South Bus Station that connect with towns in Toledo.    SECURITY It is the headquarters of the BESCAM (Autonomous Police of the Community of Madrid). It is close to the Civil Guard headquarters in the neighboring town of Valdemoro.    EDUCATION “Petirrojo” public nursery (0 to 3 years) Ecoescuela “San José” (Infant Education and Public Primary) C. E. I. P. Bilingual "Abad y Harija" (Infant Education and Public Primary) I. E. S. “Miguel Delibes” (Public Secondary Education Institute) “Castilla” School (Concerted Center for Infant, Primary and Secondary Education - Private High School)    Torrejón de la Calzada is a quiet municipality with all services. A good town to live in.    NO COMMISSION FOR THE BUYER.

We also find, as is logical, on that floor a large kitchen and a bathroom with a shower, and going up to the first floor three bedrooms, one en suite with a dressing room and bathroom and another full bathroom that serves the other two rooms with built-in wardrobes. and one of them has a large terrace with views of the pool. Already located on the semi-basement floor we find a huge pantry, a wonderful multi-use cellar lined with stone with direct access to the plot, a garage for one car and a toilet and laundry area. Don't miss this wonderful home, come see it, it is better than what can be seen in the photos.
